ygData.subject: Re: Suggestions for high teen levels in unrest?
ygData.msgSnippet: I was at Unrest at lvl 23 with a full group including a 2nd cleric.  The place was horrible.  Death after death after death.  Between deaths and running to the
ygData.messageBody:
I was at Unrest at lvl 23 with a full group including a 2nd cleric. The
place was horrible. Death after death after death. Between deaths and
running to the zone there were no points made. The only time we were there
successfully was in a room (hand room) i think. Then shortly a high lvl
cleric came in and ran us out....i am now almost lvl 27 and haven't been
back yet. I may try to go back soon though...


>From: "William Hooker" <wahooker@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ_CLERIC@..., EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Suggestions for high teen levels in unrest?
>Date: Fri, 24 Sep 1999 07:52:25 EDT
>
>From: "William Hooker" <wahooker@...>
>
>I have heard from many many people that unrest is a great place for a
>cleric
>to go starting around 14 or so. I am 17th (almost 18th) and am having
>serious trouble there. Last night 6 people from my guild were there, all
>15-20 and we had a rough time.
>
>We were at the back wall pulling from the back door. We had SoW and invis
>to undead on the puller at all times, but there were many times where she
>ended up bringing quite a few too many ghouls. (tried to pull 1 and
>suddenly there were 7 of them on us!)
>
>Are we hunting at too high a level, or are we pulling from the wrong place?
>Or do we just suck? We only had 2 deaths last night, but many many many
>close calls. Lets just say thank god our druid was also saving 50% mana
>for
>heals.
>
>Meddik
>Jaegergruppe
>Bristlebane
>
>
